thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 60 of 1961
thread.title: Carl Sukonik

author: Carl Sukonik
title: Carl Sukonik
text:
When I booked online it was quick and easy to do and my tyres where automatically selected when entering my registration number. It was easy to book a time and the cost of fitting the wheel was slightly cheaper than going to a garage.
As promised an agent rang me to specify an exact time the fitter would arrive within a two hour period. They were very friendly and helpful. The fitter (Tony L) rang beforehand and told me when they were due. Arrived on time and fitted the wheel within 15 minutes.
A mush easier and faster process than going to a garage and either leaving the car or waiting around.
Will definitely use again.
